// src/pages/user/home/Home.js import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { menlatest, categoriesdata, womenlatest, kidslatest, accessoriesproducts } from '../../../data/Homedata'; import './Home.css'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { useCart } from '../../../context/CartContext'; import Notification from '../../../components/user/notification/Notification'; import { faCartShopping } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; const Home = () => { const { cart, addToCart, notification } = useCart(); const products = [ { id: 1, name: 'Luxury Chronograph Watch', price: 349.99, image: '/images/watch1.jpg' }, { id: 2, name: 'Designer Handbag', price: 199.99, image: '/images/handbag1.jpg' } ]; return (
{/* Hero Banner */}
{/* Notification component */} {/* Product Grid */}

Our Products

{cart.length === 0 && (

Your cart is empty. Start shopping!

)}
{products.map(product => (

{product.name}

${product.price.toFixed(2)}

))}

Summer Sale Up to 50% Off

Discover our new collection

Shop Now
{/* Featured Categories */}

Shop by Category

{categoriesdata.map((category) => (

{category.name}

{category.description}

))}
{/* Featured Products */}

Men's Latest

{menlatest.map((product) => (

{product.name}

{'★'.repeat(Math.floor(product.rating))} {'☆'.repeat(5 - Math.floor(product.rating))}

${product.price.toFixed(2)}

))}
{/* Featured Products */}

Women's Latest

{womenlatest.map((product) => (

{product.name}

{'★'.repeat(Math.floor(product.rating))} {'☆'.repeat(5 - Math.floor(product.rating))}

${product.price.toFixed(2)}

))}

Kid's Latest

{kidslatest.map((product) => (

{product.name}

{'★'.repeat(Math.floor(product.rating))} {'☆'.repeat(5 - Math.floor(product.rating))}

${product.price.toFixed(2)}

))}
{/* Promotional Banner */}

New Arrivals

Discover the latest trends in fashion

Explore Now

Explore Our Products

{accessoriesproducts.map((product, index) => (

{product.name}

{product.description}

View Collection
))}
); }; export default Home;
